mil3.1.7:1.2: “Is it not, venerable Nāgasena, that the one who does not reconnect does not do so because of careful attention?”
mil3.1.7:1.3: “It is because of careful attention, your majesty, and because of wisdom and other skilful mental states.”
mil3.1.7:1.4: “Is careful attention, venerable sir, the same as wisdom?”
mil3.1.7:1.5: “Certainly not, your majesty, careful attention is one thing, wisdom is another. Goats, rams, bulls, buffalos, camels, and donkeys also have careful attention, but they do not have wisdom.”
